data.message: Hey Coca-Cola! With all the respect, having a bottle that is 100% recycable is the minimun we expect from the largest beverage company in the world. What about making a biodegradable bottle? Now THAT would be awesome!

replies.message: Hi Getulio, we’ve been researching and creating alternatives to oil based plastics, such as our PlantBottle™, which is the first-ever recyclable plastic bottle made from plants. We use the PlantBottle for all of our Honest Tea and Smartwater range here in Great Britain and are always looking at ways that we can expand its use across our portfolio.
